subject: Automobile Racing
Drug Abuse and Traffic
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: CINCINNATI, Nov. 27 (AP) — The Nascar driver Aaron Fike understands where he was headed when he was arrested while shooting heroin in an amusement park parking lot this summer.
snippet: CINCINNATI, Nov. 27 (AP) — The Nascar driver Aaron Fike understands where he was headed when he was arrested while shooting heroin in an amusement park parking lot this summer.
